interpretation:
The Firefighter card represents bravery, heroism, and protection. This card signifies that you or someone close to you may be called upon to take on a difficult task or challenge. The Firefighter is a symbol of courage and the willingness to put oneself in harm's way to help others. This card also represents the idea of rescue, whether it be physical rescue from danger or emotional rescue from a difficult situation. It is a reminder to be selfless and to put the needs of others before your own.

In a reading, the Firefighter card may indicate that you need to step up and take action in a situation where others are in need. It may also suggest that you need to be courageous and face your fears in order to move forward. The Firefighter card can also represent a person in your life who embodies these qualities and can provide guidance and support. Overall, this card reminds us that bravery and heroism are not just reserved for those in uniform, but can be found in all of us when we are called upon to protect and serve others.
